name: Crime Time (bodCodes)
description:
This game was created in 72hrs around the theme of "Delay the inevitable" for the 2022 Ludum Dare 50 Game Jam.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/crime-time

Code, graphics, sound and music created during the jam by bodCodes.

Controls/Options
  • W/A/S/D to move.
  • Arrow keys/middle mouse to pan.
  • Toggles: (M)usic  S(o)und  Effec(t)s
  • Fullscreen button (bottom left of screen)

Developed with LÖVE 11.4.

Downloads

If the browser version does not run well, please download either the standalone Window version or the cross-platform LOVE2D version.  For the LOVE2D version you will also need to install the LOVE2D framework.
